effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 10 HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 10 HP.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　持たせると
ＨＰを　１０だけ　回復する。

A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon.
If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore its
own HP by 10 points during battle.

Se un Pokémon ha questa bacca, recupera
10 PS.

Al usarla con un Pokémon, se gana su amistad,
pero también reduce su Ataque Especial de base.

Gibst du die Beere einem Pokémon zum Tragen,
füllt sie seine KP um 10 Punkte auf.

Une Baie qui restaure 10 PV lorsqu’elle est
tenue par un Pokémon.

ポケモンに　もたせると
ＨＰを　１０だけ　かいふくする。

If held by a Pokémon,
it heals the user by just 10 HP.

If held by a Pokémon, 
it heals the user by just 10 HP.

Baie qui restaure 10 PV lorsqu’elle
est tenue par un Pokémon.

It may be used or held by a Pokémon to
heal the user by just 10 HP.

A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to heal the
user by just 10 HP.

A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to heal the
user by just 10 HP.

When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle to restore 10 HP.

restores 10 HP in
